r.s: Provides faster json decoding through simdjson bindings for PHP
r.d: Provides faster json decoding through simdjson bindings for PHP (Single Instruction, Multiple Data)
r.n: * Add `-fvisibility=hidden` to compiler options to reduce compiled extension size by avoiding exporting symbols by default. * If the requested json parsing $depth is excessively large when reallocating larger buffers for the C simdjson parser, then internally use a smaller $depth that would behave identically with lower memory usage. (#66) * Update simdjson to properly reject surrogate pairs with an invalid low surrogate. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTF-16)
